text: Dame Elmira Minita Gordon (30 December 1930Profile of Elmira Minita Gordon - 1 January 2021) was a Belizean politician. She was the first Governor General of Belize from its independence in 1981 until her retirement in 1993.Biodata , terra.es; accessed 20 July 2015. Gordon was the only woman to have been Governor General of Belize. Gordon was replaced by Colville Young. Gordon died on 1 January 2021 at her home in Los Angeles, California, just two days after her 90th birthday.Dame Elmira Minita Gordon, trailblazing educator and first Governor-General, dead at 90 ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Psychologists Category:Governors-general of Belize
title: Elmira Minita Gordon
